instruction: Give me a recipe that uses chocolate and hazelnuts.
output: This recipe for chocolate hazelnut brownies is sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. Start by preheating the oven to 350F and grease a 9 inch square baking pan. In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup of butter and 1 cup of sugar. Beat in 2 eggs and 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract. In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup of flour, 1/4 teaspoon of baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon of salt, 1/2 cup of cocoa powder, 1/2 cup of hazelnuts and 1/2 cup of chocolate chips. Add the flour mixture to the butter mixture and blend until combined. Pour the batter into the greased pan and bake for 25-30 minutes. Enjoy!
